00055 class TGTextDialog:public TGTransientFrame {
00056 
00057  protected:
00058    TGCompositeFrame * fF1, *fF2;        // sub frames
00059    TGButton *fOkButton;         // ok button
00060    TGButton *fCancelButton;     // cancel button
00061    TGLayoutHints *fL1, *fL5, *fL6, *fL21;       // layout hints
00062    TGTextEntry *fText;          // text entry widget
00063    TGTextBuffer *fBLabel;       // text buffer
00064    TGLabel *fLabel;             // label
00065    char *fRetStr;               // return string
00066 
00067  public:
00068     TGTextDialog(const TGWindow * p, const TGWindow * main, UInt_t w, UInt_t h,
00069                  char *label, char *ret_str, UInt_t options = kVerticalFrame);
00070     virtual ~ TGTextDialog();
00071 
00072    virtual void CloseWindow();
00073    virtual Bool_t ProcessMessage(Long_t msg, Long_t parm1, Long_t parm2);
00074 
00075    //ClassDef(TGTextDialog, 0)
00076 };
00077

00080 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00081 
00082 TGTextDialog::TGTextDialog(const TGWindow * p, const TGWindow * main,
00083                            UInt_t w, UInt_t h, char *label, char *ret_str,
00084                            UInt_t options):TGTransientFrame(p, main, w, h, options)
00085 {
00086 /* Create a dialog to enter a single line text entry */
00087 
00088    fRetStr = ret_str;
00089 
00090    ChangeOptions((GetOptions() & ~kVerticalFrame) | kHorizontalFrame);
00091 
00092    fF1 = new TGCompositeFrame(this, 60, 20, kVerticalFrame | kFixedWidth);
00093    fF2 = new TGCompositeFrame(this, 60, 20, kHorizontalFrame);
00094 
00095    fOkButton = new TGTextButton(fF1, new TGHotString("&Ok"), 1);
00096    fCancelButton = new TGTextButton(fF1, new TGHotString("&Cancel"), 2);
00097    fF1->Resize(fOkButton->GetDefaultWidth() + 40, GetDefaultHeight());
00098 
00099    fOkButton->Associate(this);
00100    fCancelButton->Associate(this);
00101 
00102    fL1 = new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsExpandX, 2, 2, 3, 0);
00103    fL21 = new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsRight, 2, 5, 10, 0);
00104 
00105    fF1->AddFrame(fOkButton, fL1);
00106    fF1->AddFrame(fCancelButton, fL1);
00107    AddFrame(fF1, fL21);
00108 
00109    fLabel = new TGLabel(fF2, new TGHotString(label));
00110 
00111    fBLabel = new TGTextBuffer(50);
00112    if (fRetStr[0])
00113       fBLabel->AddText(0, fRetStr);
00114    else
00115       fOkButton->SetState(kButtonDisabled);
00116 
00117    fText = new TGTextEntry(fF2, fBLabel);
00118    fText->Associate(this);
00119    fText->Resize(220, fText->GetDefaultHeight());
00120    fText->SelectAll();
00121 
00122    fL5 = new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsLeft | kLHintsCenterY, 3, 5, 0, 0);
00123    fL6 = new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsLeft | kLHintsCenterY, 0, 2, 0, 0);
00124 
00125    fF2->AddFrame(fLabel, fL5);
00126    fF2->AddFrame(fText, fL5);
00127    AddFrame(fF2, fL1);
00128 
00129    MapSubwindows();
00130    Resize(GetDefaultSize());
00131 
00132    // position relative to the parent's window
00133    Int_t ax, ay;
00134    if (main) {
00135       Window_t wdum;
00136       gVirtualX->TranslateCoordinates(main->GetId(), GetParent()->GetId(),
00137                                       (Int_t) (((TGFrame *) main)->GetWidth() -
00138                                                fWidth) >> 1,
00139                                       (Int_t) (((TGFrame *) main)->GetHeight() -
00140                                                fHeight) >> 1, ax, ay, wdum);
00141    } else {
00142       UInt_t root_w, root_h;
00143       gVirtualX->GetWindowSize(fClient->GetRoot()->GetId(), ax, ay, root_w, root_h);
00144       ax = (root_w - fWidth) >> 1;
00145       ay = (root_h - fHeight) >> 1;
00146    }
00147 
00148    Move(ax, ay);
00149    SetWMPosition(ax, ay);
00150 
00151    SetWindowName("Enter Text");
00152 
00153    SetMWMHints(kMWMDecorAll | kMWMDecorMaximize | kMWMDecorMenu,
00154                kMWMFuncAll | kMWMFuncMaximize | kMWMFuncResize, kMWMInputModeless);
00155 
00156    MapWindow();
00157    fClient->WaitFor(this);
00158 }

00171    delete fF2;
00172    delete fL1;

00180 void TGTextDialog::CloseWindow()
00181 {
00182    // Close the dialog. On close the dialog will be deleted and cannot be
00183    // re-used.
00184 
00185    DeleteWindow();
00186 }
00187 
00188 Bool_t TGTextDialog::ProcessMessage(Long_t msg, Long_t parm1, Long_t)
00189 {
00190    const char *string;
00191 
00192    switch (GET_MSG(msg)) {
00193    case kC_COMMAND:
00194       switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg)) {
00195       case kCM_BUTTON:
00196          switch (parm1) {
00197          case 1:
00198             if (fRetStr)
00199                strcpy(fRetStr, fBLabel->GetString());
00200             CloseWindow();
00201             break;
00202          case 2:
00203             fRetStr[0] = 0;
00204             CloseWindow();
00205             break;
00206          }
00207          break;
00208 
00209       default:
00210          break;
00211       }
00212       break;
00213 
00214    case kC_TEXTENTRY:
00215       switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg)) {
00216       case kTE_TEXTCHANGED:
00217          string = fBLabel->GetString();
00218          if (strlen(string) == 0)
00219             fOkButton->SetState(kButtonDisabled);
00220          else
00221             fOkButton->SetState(kButtonUp);
00222          break;
00223       case kTE_ENTER:
00224          if (fRetStr)
00225             strcpy(fRetStr, fBLabel->GetString());
00226          CloseWindow();
00227          break;
00228       default:
00229          break;
00230       }
00231       break;
00232 
00233    default:
00234       break;
00235    }
00236 
00237    return kTRUE;
00238 }

00245    B_UPDATE,
00246    B_CLEAR,

00251 class RMidasFrame:public TGMainFrame {
00252 
00253  private:

00255    TGPopupMenu *fMenuFile;

00257    TGTab *fTab;
00258    TGCompositeFrame *fTabHisto;
00259    TGCompositeFrame *fTabStatus;

00262    TGHorizontalFrame *fHorz2;
00263    TGHorizontalFrame *fHorz3;
00264 
00265    TGListBox *fListBox;

00269    TGTextButton *fBClear;
00270

00272    TSocket *fSock;

00275    TH1 *fHisto;
00276

00280    void ClearHisto(const char *name);

00290 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00291 
00292 int RMidasFrame::ConnectServer()
00293 {
00294    char str[80];
00295 
00296    if (fSock) {
00297       /* disconnect first */
00298       fSock->Close();
00299       delete fSock;
00300       fSock = NULL;
00301 
00302       SetWindowName("RMidas");
00303 
00304       fListBox->RemoveEntries(0, 999);
00305    }
00306 
00307    if (fHost[0] == 0) {
00308       new TGTextDialog(gClient->GetRoot(), this, 100, 100, "&Host name:", fHost);
00309    }
00310 
00311    /* Connect to RMidasServ */
00312    fSock = new TSocket(fHost, 9090);
00313 
00314    if (!fSock->IsValid()) {
00315       sprintf(str, "Cannot connect to RMidas server on host %s, port 9090\n", fHost);
00316       new TGMsgBox(gClient->GetRoot(), this, "Error", str, kMBIconExclamation, 0, NULL);
00317 
00318       SetWindowName("RMidas");
00319       return 0;
00320    } else {
00321       fSock->Recv(str, sizeof(str));
00322       if (strncmp(str, "RMSERV", 6)) {
00323          sprintf(str, "RMidas server not found on host %s, port 9090\n", fHost);
00324          new TGMsgBox(gClient->GetRoot(), this, "Error", str, kMBIconExclamation, 0,
00325                       NULL);
00326 
00327          fSock->Close();
00328          delete fSock;
00329          fSock = NULL;
00330 
00331          SetWindowName("RMidas");
00332          return 0;
00333       } else {
00334          sprintf(str, "RMidas connected to %s", fHost);
00335          SetWindowName(str);
00336          GetHistoList();
00337          return 1;
00338       }
00339    }
00340 }
00341 
00342 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00343 
00344 void RMidasFrame::GetHistoList()
00345 {
00346    int i;
00347 
00348    fSock->Send("LIST");
00349 
00350    TMessage *m;
00351    fSock->Recv(m);
00352 
00353    if (fHistoNames)
00354       delete fHistoNames;
00355 
00356    fHistoNames = (TObjArray *) m->ReadObject(m->GetClass());
00357 
00358    for (i = 0; i < fHistoNames->GetLast() + 1; i++)
00359       fListBox->AddEntry((const char *) ((TObjString *) (fHistoNames->At(i)))->String(),
00360                          i);
00361 
00362    fListBox->MapSubwindows();
00363    fListBox->Layout();
00364    delete m;
00365 }
00366 
00367 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00368 
00369 void RMidasFrame::GetHisto(const char *name)
00370 {
00371    TMessage *m;
00372    char str[32];
00373 
00374    sprintf(str, "GET %s", name);
00375    fSock->Send(str);
00376    fSock->Recv(m);
00377 
00378    if (fHisto)
00379       delete fHisto;
00380 
00381    fHisto = (TH1 *) m->ReadObject(m->GetClass());
00382 
00383    if (!fHisto)
00384       printf("Histo \"%s\" not available\n", name);
00385    else
00386       fHisto->Draw();
00387 
00388    fCanvas->GetCanvas()->Modified();
00389    fCanvas->GetCanvas()->Update();
00390 
00391    delete m;
00392 }
00393 
00394 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00395 
00396 void RMidasFrame::ClearHisto(const char *name)
00397 {
00398    char str[32];
00399 
00400    sprintf(str, "CLEAR %s", name);
00401    fSock->Send(str);
00402    fSock->Recv(str, sizeof(str));
00403 }

00407 RMidasFrame::RMidasFrame(const TGWindow * p, UInt_t w, UInt_t h,
00408                          char *host):TGMainFrame(p, w, h)
00409 {
00410    /* save host name */
00411    if (host)
00412       strcpy(fHost, host);
00413    else
00414       fHost[0] = 0;
00415    fSock = NULL;
00416 
00417    /* Create Menus */
00418    fMenuFile = new TGPopupMenu(fClient->GetRoot());
00419    fMenuFile->AddEntry("&Connect to ...", M_FILE_CONNECT);
00420    fMenuFile->AddEntry("E&xit", M_FILE_EXIT);
00421    fMenuFile->Associate(this);
00422 
00423    fMenuBar = new TGMenuBar(this, 1, 1, kHorizontalFrame);
00424    fMenuBar->AddPopup("&File", fMenuFile,
00425                       new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 0, 4, 0, 0));
00426 
00427    AddFrame(fMenuBar,
00428             new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft | kLHintsExpandX, 0, 0, 1, 1));
00429 
00430    /* Create tab widget */
00431    fTab = new TGTab(this, 600, 400);
00432 
00433   /*---- histo tab ----*/
00434 
00435    TGCompositeFrame *tf = fTab->AddTab("Histo");
00436    fTabHisto = new TGCompositeFrame(tf, 60, 20, kVerticalFrame);
00437 
00438    /* Create a horizonal frame containing histo selection tree and canvas */
00439    fHorz1 = new TGHorizontalFrame(fTabHisto, 600, 400);
00440    fTabHisto->AddFrame(fHorz1,
00441                        new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY, 3, 3, 3, 0));
00442 
00443    /* Create ListBox widget */
00444    fListBox = new TGListBox(fHorz1, 1);
00445    fListBox->Resize(100, 400);
00446    fListBox->Associate(this);
00447    fHorz1->AddFrame(fListBox, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandY, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00448 
00449    /* Create an embedded canvas and add to the main frame, centered in x and y */
00450    fCanvas = new TRootEmbeddedCanvas("Canvas", fHorz1, 400, 400);
00451    fHorz1->AddFrame(fCanvas,
00452                     new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00453 
00454    /* Create a horizonal frame containing text buttons */
00455    fHorz2 = new TGHorizontalFrame(fTabHisto, 600, 30);
00456    fTabHisto->AddFrame(fHorz2, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00457 
00458    /* Create "Update" button */
00459    fBUpdate = new TGTextButton(fHorz2, "Update", B_UPDATE);
00460    fBUpdate->Associate(this);
00461    fHorz2->AddFrame(fBUpdate, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsCenterX, 10, 10, 4, 4));
00462 
00463    /* Create "Clear" button */
00464    fBClear = new TGTextButton(fHorz2, "Clear", B_CLEAR);
00465    fBClear->Associate(this);
00466    fHorz2->AddFrame(fBClear, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsCenterX, 10, 10, 4, 4));
00467 
00468    tf->AddFrame(fTabHisto, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00469 
00470   /*---- status tab ----*/
00471 
00472    tf = fTab->AddTab("Status");
00473    fTabStatus = new TGCompositeFrame(tf, 60, 20, kVerticalFrame);
00474    /*
00475       fHorz3 = new TGHorizontalFrame(fTabStatus, 600, 400);
00476       fTabStatus->AddFrame(fHorz3, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX|kLHintsExpandY, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00477       fHorz3->AddFrame(new TGLabel(fTabStatus, "Test"), new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX|kLHintsExpandY, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00478     */
00479    fTabStatus->
00480        AddFrame(new TGLabel(fTabStatus, "Here will come the experiment status display"),
00481                 new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop, 100, 100, 100, 0));
00482    tf->AddFrame(fTabStatus, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00483 
00484   /*--------------------*/
00485 
00486    AddFrame(fTab, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00487 
00488    SetWindowName("RMidas");
00489 
00490    MapSubwindows();
00491    Resize(GetDefaultSize());
00492    MapWindow();
00493 
00494    fHisto = 0;
00495    fHistoNames = 0;
00496 
00497    /* connect to MRootServer */
00498    ConnectServer();
00499 }

00501 void RMidasFrame::CloseWindow()
00502 {
00503    // Got close message for this MainFrame. Terminate the application
00504    // or returns from the TApplication event loop (depending on the
00505    // argument specified in TApplication::Run()).
00506 
00507    gApplication->Terminate(0);
00508 }
00509 
00510 Bool_t RMidasFrame::ProcessMessage(Long_t msg, Long_t param1, Long_t param2)
00511 {
00512    // Process messages coming from widgets associated with the dialog.
00513 
00514    switch (GET_MSG(msg)) {
00515    case kC_COMMAND:
00516 
00517       switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg)) {
00518       case kCM_MENU:
00519          switch (param1) {
00520          case M_FILE_EXIT:
00521             CloseWindow();
00522             break;
00523 
00524          case M_FILE_CONNECT:
00525             fHost[0] = 0;
00526             ConnectServer();
00527             break;
00528          }
00529          break;
00530 
00531       case kCM_BUTTON:
00532          switch (param1) {
00533          case B_UPDATE:
00534             if (fHisto)
00535                GetHisto((char *) fHisto->GetName());
00536             break;
00537 
00538          case B_CLEAR:
00539             if (fHisto) {
00540                ClearHisto((char *) fHisto->GetName());
00541                GetHisto((char *) fHisto->GetName());
00542             }
00543             break;
00544          }
00545          break;
00546 
00547       case kCM_LISTBOX:
00548          GetHisto((const char *) ((TObjString *) (fHistoNames->At(param2)))->String());
00549          break;
00550 
00551 
00552       case kCM_TAB:
00553          //printf("Tab item %ld activated\n", param1);
00554          break;
00555       }
00556       break;
00557 
00558    }
00559 
00560    return kTRUE;
00561 }
00562 
00563 RMidasFrame::~RMidasFrame()
00564 {
00565    // Clean up
00566 
00567    delete fMenuBar;
00568    delete fMenuFile;
00569    delete fHisto;
00570    delete fHistoNames;
00571    delete fSock;
00572    delete fBUpdate;
00573    delete fHorz1;
00574    delete fHorz2;
00575    delete fCanvas;
00576 }
00577 
00578 void rmidas()
00579 {
00580    new RMidasFrame(gClient->GetRoot(), 200, 200, "pc2948");
00581 }
00582 
00583 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00584 {
00585    TApplication theApp("RMidas", &argc, argv);
00586 
00587    if (gROOT->IsBatch()) {
00588       printf("%s: cannot run in batch mode\n", argv[0]);
00589       return 1;
00590    }
00591 
00592    new RMidasFrame(gClient->GetRoot(), 200, 200, argv[1]);
00593 
00594    theApp.Run();
00595 
00596    return 0;
00597 }
